booking.hotel.name: Acevi Villarroel

cancellationpolicies.text: Cancellation made less than 1 day (12:00) prior to the arrival will be charged with 100% of the total booking value.

booking.bookedBy: TEST BOOKING, VOUCHER NOT VALID FOR USE. SunHotels T: 0034 971 425588 Booking reference: TESTXML

hotelNote.text: All stays in a hotel/apartment must pay 0.75 € per day per person if they stay in hotels of 1-2-3 stars 1.25 € per day per person if they stay in hotels of 4 stars and 2.5 € per day per person if they stay in 5 star hotels. This city tax is paid on check in/out directly to the hotel/apartment.

1x FAMILY ROOM Estimated total amount of taxes & fees for this booking: 9.68 Euro payable on arrival.Car park YES (with additional debit notes) 22.00 EUR Per unit/night. Check-in hour - . No hen/stag or any other parties allowed - .Delux rooms have SPA access.
